stories.text:
Hi all,

Back when I was running a one-person SaaS company the one task I often neglected was writing and updating documentation.

I've recently been working on the documentation tool I wish I had back then - something that makes it quick and easy to create docs, as well as helps keep them up to date and improves discoverability.

I've got as far as a very simple proof of concept, so now I'd love to know if there's anyone else who would be interested in a tool like this.

The link below is to a quick survey, which includes a demo video of the app working:

https://forms.gle/aNiw1Wp5gejjqGPy9

Thanks, Matt
stories.title: Ask HN: Help (in)validate my side project idea
